00014         class Program
00015         {
00016                 static void Main(string[] args)
00017                 {
00018                         if (args.Length != 1)
00019                         {
00020                                 usage();
00021                                 return;
00022                         }
00023                         
00024                         Globals.Initialize();
00025                         
00026                         /* uncomment this to get a ton of stuff
00027                          * dumped to the console -- annoying if not
00028                          * debugging the program */
00029                         //Globals.VISUAL = true;
00030                         
00031                         /* parse the source and generate an intermediate file */
00032                         RDP parser = new RDP(args[0]);
00033                         
00034                         /* generate the assembly */
00035                         GenAsm four_star_general_assembly = new GenAsm(Globals.filename, Globals.symTab, Globals.strTab);
00036                         four_star_general_assembly.Generate();
00037                         
00038                         if (Globals.VISUAL)
00039                         {
00040                                 Console.WriteLine();
00041                                 Globals.symTab.WriteTable(0);
00042                                 Globals.Wait("\nPress enter to view the string table...");
00043                         
00044                                 /* print out the string table */
00045                                 nsClearConsole.ClearConsole c = new nsClearConsole.ClearConsole();
00046                                 c.Clear();
00047                                 Globals.strTab.PrintTable();
00048                                 Globals.Wait("");
00049                         }
00050                         
00051                         Globals.Wait("Compilation successful!\nPress enter to quit...");
00052                 }
00053                 
00054                 static void usage()
00055                 {
00056                         System.Console.WriteLine("usage: mono minicsharp.exe filename");
00057                 }
00058                 
00059                 public static void PrintHeader()
00060                 {
00061                         System.Console.WriteLine("Token\t\t        Lexeme\t\t        Attribute");
00062                         System.Console.WriteLine("-----\t\t        ------\t\t        ---------");
00063                 }
00064         }
